name: Adventures with Classmates DEMO
description:
The protagonist is a 20-year-old boy who is invited by his ex-classmates for a new adventure! They will meet new people, face battles and... GROUP HUG!

Main Characters
  • Carlo: he doesn't talk much, but he has a tender heart;
  • Val: an excellent chef;
  • Trucconia: she loves to attack and attack (and make up lol);
  • Fedem: the emo of the group.

This demo was made for Devtober 2022! Check!
